problem.markdown:
>>Why did the company think that the new NC machine would help them when they bought it?<<
( ) Because the new machine is more reliable and will produce less defective parts. (x) Because they confused capacity and delay. The time from start to finish for a part would be less, but it could not be done in parallel, so the capacity was less. ( ) Because the new machine has a shorter cycle time, thus it will produce more parts.
